Localization.Name: Mirai
Localization.Description: The Mirai design team is dedicated to pairing the craftsmanship of their parent company MISC with Xi’an technology and traditional Saisei aesthetics to create the next generation of cutting-edge vehicles.

English.Name: Mirai
English.Description: The Mirai design team is dedicated to pairing the craftsmanship of their parent company MISC with Xi’an technology and traditional Saisei aesthetics to create the next generation of cutting-edge vehicles.
